title: Ashe and Sivir are properly balanced ADCs
body: It's a shame they exist in such a meta where hypercarries basically reach their powerspike after IE and shiv.

In my opinion, strong *was* Trist, Kog, Xayah, and Varus. Bot lane only has room for up to 4 top tiers at once, so that's about it for me.
